website_summaries.verdict: Layers upon layers of natural materials satisfy shredding instincts and require some work to get through, keeping feathered friends coming back for more.
pros: Palm leaves and natural rope offer a variety of interesting textures
Woven construction takes a while to unravel
Vivid colors help attract shy birds
A combination of tough materials and clever craftsmanship keep this toy going longer than most
Provides a safe and appropriate outlet for destructive behaviour
cons: We’d love to see a sturdy link fastener rather than just a rope

customer_reviews.title: When he says "I'm 10 inches"
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy toy and looks like fun, but someone likes to exaggerate what 10 inches is. Note: I am a female with average sized hands
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toy that last more than a day!
customer_reviews.text: My African Grey LOVES this piñata! I bought several toys but this one will last a few days! It didn’t take long for Ruby to accept it and has been foraging and chewing ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Glad I could buy a good supply at ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Glad I could buy a good supply at very reasonable bulk price. I have a bird who is a plucker and 'shreddy' toys keep his mind off his belly!
customer_reviews.author: Jill fron NJ

customer_reviews.title: Maccaws loved it. (17 in)
customer_reviews.text: My 2 maccaws love it. "Razorbeak" is very destructive and it gives her something to do. I buy toys at least every other week, but this one looks like it will last at least 1 more week if not 2 with all the layers. Selena and Blue give it a 2 talons up. It's important to note I bought the extra large.
customer_reviews.author: Chrysalis

customer_reviews.title: The toy itself seems interesting but for whatever reason my ...
customer_reviews.text: The toy itself seems interesting but for whatever reason my parrot won’t touch it, and neither will my chinchillas! Had to put it away for now, will try to place it in the cage again in a month or so!
customer_reviews.author: Zangief

customer_reviews.title: My Senegal loves these!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I buy them from here all the time for Senegal, though they would be great for any medium sized parrot. How they are woven makes them a bit harder to chew through and destroy than other shredding toys, making your bird work and think to get it fully destroyed. Got to keep those bird brains active!
customer_reviews.author: Gen Marie

customer_reviews.title: great shredder, good quality, very lasting for parakeets
customer_reviews.text: took a while for my parakeet to find it. now she is tearing it up. for a parakeet it is actually very durable. from the picture you see the toy becomes shredded once the outer layer is torn open. what I like is the shredded pieces are mostly still hanging. very few pieces have fallen to the cage floor, that's why I sat it is durable. I have a flock of 14 parakeets, an 2 are going beserk on this toy. ( I WAS GOING TO BUY 2 OR 3 MORE FOR MY LARGE CAGE, BUT THE PRICE WENT UP ALMOST 50 PERCENT TO REORDER???????????????????? happens all the time on amazon. hope the seller read this review.
customer_reviews.author: earl

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: My birds love these. This was a good price too. Will purchase more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: MerryA

customer_reviews.title: My budgie loves chewing this!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new budgie a week ago and this was one of the toys I put in his cage when I brought him home. He's still settling in, but so far this is the only toy he has shown any interest in! He loves grooming the little tufts coming out the sides and the bottom. He also likes to grab the tuft on the bottom, pull it far to the side, and watch it swing around when he lets go! Keeps his little beak occupied and seems like it will hold up well to a lot of chewing time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Cockatoo that tries to destroy everything in his sight, and this is the second one of these that I have purchased. He now has 1 1/2 of them hanging in his cage. He hasn't even gotten through the first one yet, which is very surprising, and he loves to pick at it during the day. It also satisfies his need to forage, which all birds do in the wild. Many times, caged birds will grow bored because all their food is readily available to them, and boredom is one thing that leads to feather picking. I plan to continue purchasing these as my bird tears his up.
customer_reviews.author: PenderRedHed

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It took a while for my bird to warm up to it but once she did it did it's job. She chews and shreds it and tries to stick the colorful bits in her tail feathers and is building a nest from the rest. For the price of $5, I'd say it was worth it. The only issue is that she chewed through the rope at the top used to hang it, causing it to fall. Even so, she has continued to use it and it keeps her somewhat more occupied and again, for the price, I absolutely reccomend this and a shredable toy for small birds.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Smelled like mildew
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to trying out a new shred toy for my African Grey, but this arrived smelling strongly of mildew so I returned it. Zero stars for the product itself, but I'm giving 3 stars because it arrived quickly and the return process was easy (Prime/FBA). As a fellow seller, I hate to give a low rating, but quality control is important.....especially on something that could potentially sicken or kill a pet parrot.
customer_reviews.author: Rhi

customer_reviews.title: This toy last a lot longer then any other toys.
customer_reviews.text: This toy been amazing he had this for 4 days and he stills working on it. Other toys I get him especially wood it only last him 2 days. We found a great toy to keep him occupied for a few days. I never write reviews but I just wanted to let everyone know this toy last a lot longer then any other toys I had got him. Only big bird owners knows what I mean. Ozzie might not be to happy because his record is 14 minutes but my pocket is lol
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: My cockatoo loves this. Keeps her busy for quite ...
customer_reviews.text: My cockatoo loves this. Keeps her busy for quite awhile .Keeps her from plucking herself which is a habit she had before I got her.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended due to the horrible smell........
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately like many others that purchased this item, I found that it stank so badly that I could not give it to my cockatoo. However, they made it easy to return, and provided a return label so that it didn't cost anything to send it back, just a trip to the UPS store. I was refunded in full as soon as it was posted.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: My parrots love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got the Extra Large for my African Gray and he absolutely loves it! Took him a little bit to get started but once he got into it he shredded like crazy! Got the little one for my Green Cheek and he's been picking at it little by little. So glad both my birds love this toy. Will definitely keep getting it!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose parrot happiness.
customer_reviews.text: My green cheek conure loves napping with her "snuggle buddy", and then ripping it to shreds. Multi-purpose parrot happiness.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome All Natural Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My bird loves this toy, it’s quickly become his favorite. I love that it’s made from all natural materials, and there’s no metal at all. The only downside is that I had to cut the little rope to tie it to the cage, but that’s a negligible inconvenience. I will be ordering many more toys from this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Generic Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made For Larger Birds
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter's cockatiel, as he is a chewer. Really surprised that he didn't want anything to do with this toy. Later, I put it in my cockatiel's cage and my bird also wanted nothing to do with it. Think it is just too hard and rigid for a smaller bird's beak. Also the size was too large. Probably a great toy for a much larger bird, but not for a cockatiel.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: A re-buy for our Goffin's Cockatoo
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue G2 absolutely LOVES the materials used for the Planet Pleasures toys. We keep the pineapple and pinatas on hand ALL the time, as he has a history of plucking, and these seem to hold his interest best of all the toys we tried. This size is just right for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Unusable piñata
customer_reviews.text: This was the second piñata I have bought here but unfortunately this one could not be put in my cockatoo’s cage as it had a very strong odor that was awful - I cannot describe the smell but I thought it would do better once I left it outside for a day or two - but the smell persisted & my Cockatoo would not go near it. Unfortunately before I could send it back it got rained on outside
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great price and kept my parrot busy.
customer_reviews.text: My parrot loves or loved this and took to shredding it right away. Parrots need stimulus so they don't get bored and develop bad habits like screaming, picking feathers or worse. You could use this as a foraging toy too by placing a treat inside. Also rotate the toys and that helps them be less bored.
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Interesting...
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy toy and our Cockatoo was very intrigued with it at first, then lost her curiosity once she got one part destroyed and no longer payed attention to the toy. So I can't say if maybe your parrot will like it better than ours.
customer_reviews.author: Narcie

customer_reviews.title: Good deal? I think lol
customer_reviews.text: These things are more expensive in the pet store if I remember correctly.. I've been making bird toys for so long because of that.. but Kiwi will be spoiled this Christmas! He saw me wrapping them and started going crazy lol.. So I know he will love it. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Dolinger

customer_reviews.title: Great shredder toy
customer_reviews.text: My African Grey loves these, and they are a great price for a large bird toy. I buy a few at a time now so I can hang a new one when he destroys the current one in his cage. Keeps him happy and occupied while I work!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice busy toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my green cheek conure because she shreds through the little ones super fast. I got the large one and it has kept her busy for weeks. Well worth the money since she needs something to shred to stay busy.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bird approved
customer_reviews.text: Took Barry a few days to be ok with this in his cage since I got one a bit too big for him. Oops. But now he climbs and bites all over it so I’m kind of glad I got the larger one. He likes it a lot. Metal free as well, always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: acf

customer_reviews.title: Our budgie is in love!
customer_reviews.text: As a first time bird owner I've been trying to find something to keep our little guy happy when he's in the cage and this is it! OMG it's pretty comical how he's treating it like his girlfriend. Sleeps leaning up against it,sings to it, it's priceless. So glad I found it, before this he was only happy when perched on me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisidonna

customer_reviews.title: pure chemical smell!!
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful with this product. I got it for my friends birds and when she opened the package the smell was atrocious. She tried airing it out but to no avail. Have a hard time believing that this is "all natural".
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great toy.
customer_reviews.text: I wish our green cheek conure would play with this. It is a sturdy nice looking toy. Its massive for her, but she hasn't really paid it any attention. It is a really well made looking toy and Im sure other larger birds would love it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Brown

customer_reviews.title: Birds toy paradise
customer_reviews.text: I have a very lively stubborn sun conjure who absolutely loves this , very long lasting. Unfortunately my pet stores no longer sell this item. Too bad, because it is definitely a good toy for any bird.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Rendernick

customer_reviews.title: This is a favorite toy.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a favorite that it is the second one I've bought for our cockatiel. He works at it more than anything else until he strips off all loose parts and starts tearing his way through the woven covering.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Popular With My Birds
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well made, durable. My 2 parakeets don`t seem to pay much attention to it, but I could be wrong because their cage is downstairs and we are always upstairs so they might play with it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hagelstien

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toy but my cockatiel is not aggressive and just not interested. I did not take off points bc of that. But I don’t see it lasting long though for any bird that does like to tear in.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Blue Fronted Amazon, Lasted about 4 months
customer_reviews.text: My amazon loved this! There are so many layers to it; other than the crisscrossed outside which i tucked seeds into, the inside is wound with lots of strips of grasses that you can hide more things in for your bird to discover. Got the XL for my amazon as a present and I bought another one for her after she completely tore it apart after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My African Grey loves these pinatas so much that I have them on my Subscribe and Save order. He loves to bat them around for a while before he begins shredding. One pinata lasts him about a month. This definitely helps keep him from getting bored.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Webster

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then I expected got the 14” size. My ...
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then I expected got the 14” size. My green cheek plays with it. Took a few days for him to start playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Nam

customer_reviews.title: Good value and well made but..
customer_reviews.text: It's too big for parakeets and scared the heck out of them. Had to take it out of the cage. I thought it was smaller when I selected it but it's huge, probably good for Parrot.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth DuBelko

customer_reviews.title: Cockatiels love them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these piñatas for years. My cockatiels have always loved them and enjoyed playing with them. It’s a great way for them to stay entertained and pass the time.
customer_reviews.author: G.H.H.

customer_reviews.title: Vinnie wouldn't touch it
customer_reviews.text: My Amazon would not touch this thing. I refuse to take off stars because he's picky. It's really durable looking and I'm sure it's a good buy if your parrot isn't picky about toys. I tried giving it to the cats with no luck. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Lovebirds.
customer_reviews.text: My lovebirds were so excited, they were all over it as I tried to hang them in their cages. I don't expect them to last long. But that's okay. I bought 2 for their love of paper toys.
customer_reviews.author: gbmiller4

customer_reviews.title: My budgies love this toy...a LOT.
customer_reviews.text: This is a large toy. It has instantly become the favorite toy of my two budgies. They chew on it all day, sitting on it, hanging upside down on it and getting to it from all their nearby perches. I’ve already ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Handsome_Hunk

customer_reviews.title: My two cockatiels love this toy
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cockatiels play with it. It's been lasting, too, and they don't get tired of it. I'd definitely buy it again (once they've decimated the one they've got right now). I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nic

customer_reviews.title: Fun chew toy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my parrotlet very entertained. Technically the size for probably a larger bird like a conure, but my parrotlet likes to chew anything, so this is ideal. Might have to buy a few more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What Happened?
customer_reviews.text: I used to like purchasing these. However, they used to be bigger and cheaper. Now with the changes I can get the same thing at my local pet store. All my reason for buying these online are gone. =(
customer_reviews.author: SEK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy! Buy for your budgies or cockatiels!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing toy! My birds went crazy for it when i first put it in. I keep the tag on Planet Pleasures toys because they are safe for birds and my birds like to chew on them. This is perfect for foraging as you can hide treats in the pockets. My budgies love to climb and perch all over it!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie The Cockatiel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for foraging
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for foraging. I slide sunflower, safflower and pumpkin seeds into the knobs/pointy things on the side of this. My Gray loves hunting them down and getting them out.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: My birds love these toys! I was not expecting them to be this large but that just even makes them even better for the price! My cockatiel especially loves shredding this toy and often pretends to kiss it and then chew on it.
customer_reviews.author: EILEEN LINDLEY

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE! LARGE TOY! <3
customer_reviews.text: SUPER LARGE! It’s PERFECT for my cockatoo destroying machine! And HE LOVESSS IT! Wonderful price for the value of this toy! I will be buying multiples next time!
customer_reviews.author: Cassieoswald

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My Grey normally goes though toys in a matter of days, if not hours but this one is pretty sturdy and she really goes to town on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this toy
customer_reviews.text: My Indian ringneck loves this toy. He loves pulling at it. And it's not so.ething that can be destroyed in a day. Very durable so far and really a big hit with our bird. Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My parrots LOVE these, and the price c;an't be beat.
customer_reviews.text: My parrots loved these so much that I ended up buying 3. The price was great, and I sent others to buy for their parrots. Thank yu!
customer_reviews.author: CaroleSue

customer_reviews.title: African Gray Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, my African Grays favorite shredding toy! She loves it! Lasts a long time, more than a month. Perfect for the money.
customer_reviews.author: LoRon

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Much better than plastic junk.
customer_reviews.text: This type of product changes price depending on the time of year so look up the different sizes before you buy. Often a large or extra large is cheaper then medium or small. Then you just get creative with the larger sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Graham

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my African gray she’s a little scared of it but just got it put in there a couple days ago so hopefully she enjoys it
customer_reviews.author: Katee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and colorful.  Looks durable
customer_reviews.text: I love these toys , they are well made and durable. This is a big toy that i bought for my cockatiel. I'm sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina F.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made but doesn't last long for my African grey. Got the 14" and it was destroyed in a day. Once he was able to get through the outside it was demolished. So sturdy yes but not durable. It's well made just not worth the money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: It's lasted longer than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 sun conures and the large must be a bit intimidating for them or they just don't like the texture of it. I have made wooden toys that are much larger that they go crazy destroying so I thought I'd try this. I'll put it in the toy box and rotate it back in later.
customer_reviews.author: Allicia

customer_reviews.title: Great for parakeet
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets love this toy (and any toy from planet pleasures). It is not too big or small for a parakeet. Keeps them busy.
customer_reviews.author: dalbi1

customer_reviews.title: Taking time introducing slowly
customer_reviews.text: I hide treats to help forging habits, also has helped the the grey from plucking along with change of diet and showering
customer_reviews.author: marylou billings

customer_reviews.title: We love everything we have ordered made by Planet Pleasures- they ...
customer_reviews.text: My Conure loves this! It's really made well. We love everything we have ordered made by Planet Pleasures- they have great products for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: d jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but better for smaller birds and parrots
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Amazons and it's a bit small. I'd say it's better fit for Conures and smaller birds, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: AMD

customer_reviews.title: hook should be metal
customer_reviews.text: My tiel chewed off the loop 1st thing. I stuck it between 2 branches that holds it perfect. My tiel loves chewing on it.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Naujokas

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for medium cockatoo
customer_reviews.text: Fun to take apart and it is stuffed with the same material that can be used for more chewing amusment.
customer_reviews.author: L. Balsam

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars but had to “ start “ it before my Cockatoo tore it up Great value !
customer_reviews.author: Bob Illingworth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for parrotlet
customer_reviews.text: My parrotlet LOVES this toy! He hasn’t torn it to shreds yet, but I feel If he was a larger parrot it would be destroyed within days. Will defiantly purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best parrot toys on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This toy in every size is constructed extremely strong. Made with high quality materials. Jam packed all the way to the center with product. Vibrant colors. Not easily destroyed. Any option you purchase is smart.
customer_reviews.author: Zelda Zoink

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy and it's much bigger than we thought
customer_reviews.text: Our bird loves this toy and we were pleasantly surprised at how big it was because the photo made it look much smaller. We are very happy with this purchase and so is our bird!
customer_reviews.author: John E.

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves shredding it!
customer_reviews.text: Great forging toy! My bird loves shredding it and it seems to be holding up fairly well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Economides

customer_reviews.title: Macaw chew toy
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my macaw it was big thick an stuffed my macaw loves it I got largest size
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: It's a destroy toy
customer_reviews.text: It is great my indian ringneck loved it. But just so you know this is a destroy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bird toy.
customer_reviews.text: Usually my Sun Conures shred toys that aren't plastic within a day. This toy is still going strong. It was the perfect size also. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: keeps birb occupied
customer_reviews.text: My green cheek conure seems to enjoy destroying this (as it is designed for). I like that it's natural materials and non-toxic for her. I got the medium size. She has had it for about a month and it's nearly completely destroyed so I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy for a Cockatiel
customer_reviews.text: Its made very well. Got it for my cockatiel. Will take him quite some time to get this apart.
customer_reviews.author: Cat_Momma

customer_reviews.title: You get milage out of this toy
customer_reviews.text: My lovebird loves demolishing this toy. It is made exactly for that. It's perfect for enrichment in your birds cage. Other toys at the pet store cost double and the size of it doesn't compare to this. Because birds like tearing things apart, the one's at the pet store will only last you a week or two. This one is still being worked on and it has been a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bird toy ever bought
customer_reviews.text: my senegal parrot absolutely loved this. This is the first toy ever that kept it entertained ALL THE TIME. better than any bells or wooden toy or shredded paper balls. Definitely satisfy my parrot's natural instinct to "destroy" / chip things into small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Keay Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made toy, but unfortunately my Senegal parrot isn't interested in it.
customer_reviews.author: ZomDee

customer_reviews.title: Very cute toy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bird toy, but my African Grey didn't touch it. Seller very nice & gave me a full refund! Seller A++++++
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: True to Size. Large is Large
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toys. Just way to big for my little birds. I’ll reorder the medium size.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen azevedo

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner
customer_reviews.text: Description was accurate, and product is very good. Price is appropriate. Be careful of 3rd party parrot toys!!!!
customer_reviews.author: old man

customer_reviews.title: Well made toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy thinking my birds would love it but my black-capped conure has barely chewed at it. She may just be intimidated by its size but we'll see. I'll keep it around and see if it eventually peaks her interest. High quality toy though!
customer_reviews.author: Zuly

customer_reviews.title: Birds favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: My eclectus loves this toy. I buy the large size so it takes her a few days to completely shred it. I think I have now bought this toy 3 times. Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know yet
customer_reviews.text: Using for my hens for a boredom buster. Haven’t had it long enough to rate the durability.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bunkers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I placed this toy in my aviary and all my birds loved it. Eventually they did destroy it but it lasted much longer then I had expected or most toys do.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra S

customer_reviews.title: Scary for conure
customer_reviews.text: Gave my Nanday Conure a fright wouldn’t go near it
customer_reviews.author: Northern Nevada Native

customer_reviews.title: Appealing to small birds
customer_reviews.text: This one is nearly destroyed—and that’s a good thing! It seems to be very appealing to birds.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie O.

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: My boy primo loves this toy. He has taken his time on it, because he does like something that makes noise.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGee-Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Very good. Destroyed in few days by my Senegal parrot.
customer_reviews.author: FLM

customer_reviews.title: A good value.
customer_reviews.text: For a shredding toy, this one is very well constructed and very solid. It has a good weight to it and seems to be made of very good materials. The size is accurate and I would say very good for a medium sized parrot such as a small Grey. If your bird love to shred and chew, this is a great addition to a cage or play stand so long as an owner recognizes that this is a shred toy and not designed for a very long cage life.
customer_reviews.author: Miech

customer_reviews.title: It's a good toy for keeping your bird occupied.
customer_reviews.text: It' was for our parrot. He really went to town on it . Enjoyed it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Epic bird toy! My African Grey parrots love them! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bird loves it!
customer_reviews.text: bird really likes this toy. I have am indian ringneck, he has been very interested in the toy and asked me to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: gear head from the coast of maine

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected but very durable
customer_reviews.text: most toys get destroyed by my parrotlet in days but this one feels like it will last a week or two he loves the stringy things to chew at great for price and durability!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: What a Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Xlarge 22" Pinata for my Male Eclectus because of him over preening his feathers. I saw the add with the female Eclectus chewing on the toy and figured it would be about the right size. Well, once I got the box, which was like 3-4 days after ordering, I realized that this would be a great size for a Large bird like a Macaw because it is BIG. Mac hasn't really taken to it yet. But he has started to nibble on it. But for the value, this toy can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: mtdoramike

customer_reviews.title: Too big and plain looking.
customer_reviews.text: What interest my bird had in it was only after I ripped holes in the toy. Piñata idea lost on my parakeet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G. in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great little piñata for Parakeets. Got the Small. We'll see how long it lasts! Parakeets love it so far. Really into it!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Salas

customer_reviews.title: Bird loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Larger than expected could have gotten away with the medium but happy anyways
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very small.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this intended for a medium sized bird. Came in cockatiel/budgie toy size. So i gave it to the cockatiels. They aren’t interested in it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Brown

customer_reviews.title: My bird LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: My bird LOVES it and I guess that is all that matters. I have a cockatiel and he started nibbling at it right away which is a shock cuz it usually takes him a while to get used to knew objects in his cage.
customer_reviews.author: Culari

customer_reviews.title: Smelled awful
customer_reviews.text: This toy is everything I was looking for, except it smells awful! I tried airing it out, but after several weeks, it still smells. The design is good. Looks like it would hold up well, but I'm afraid to give it to my bird because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Gina B.

product_meta.title: Planet Pleasures Spiked Pinata Natural Bird Toy
product_meta.description: Size:Large 14"It's parrot party time! Parrot Piñata is fun to chew and full of surprises that helps eliminate bird boredom. All natural palm leaves, woven into an enticing pinata that's stuffed full of more natural, shreddable stuffing. Handmade in the Philippines of all natural materials and utilizing only renewable and recycled materials. Be good to the environment choose Planet Pleasure toys. Planet Pleasures makes natural bird toys for every occasion. Our spiked Pinata is available in four sizes. Planet Pleasures also offers several styles of Pinata's and other foraging toys.
feature_bullets: It's parrot party time! Parrot Piñata is fun to chew and full of surprises that helps eliminate bird boredom
All natural palm leaves, woven into an enticing pinata that's stuffed full of more natural, shreddable stuffing
Handmade in the Philippines of all natural materials
Utilizing only renewable and recycled materials
Be good to the environment choose Planet Pleasure toys
